metadata.title: CVE-2019-17570 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An untrusted deserialization was found in theorg.apache.xmlrpc.parser.XmlRpcResponseParser:addResult method of ApacheXML-RPC (aka ws-xmlrpc) library. A malicious XML-RPC server could target aXML-RPC client causing it to execute arbitrary code. Apache XML-RPC is nolonger maintained and this issue will not be fixed.

criterions.comment: libxmlrpc3-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
